column2: "I have a request for you, Leader. Can you get Gene away from here for a little bit?"
"I... want to do something to thank her for all she's done. For cooking that meal, and for sending you to search planet Lillipa."
"I just need a little time to prepare my thanks. But I don't want you to take too long."
"I think the best option would be to clear a time-limited mission then come back here."

"What am I preparing...?
I'm keeping that a secret for now. I don't want Gene to overhear."
